1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Link and run relmaps.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Run
7  ( relkitLink,
8    relkitRun,
9    fixedRelation,
10    bmapAlign,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                 as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                   as D
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Relkit     as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Construct  as C
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap.Message    as Msg
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit.Message    as Msg
21
22relkitLink :: forall c. (Ord c) => C.RelkitTable c -> O.Map (C.Relkit c)
23relkitLink kits = linkKit where
24    linkKit :: O.Map (C.Relkit c)
25    linkKit (C.Relkit hi ho bo) = C.Relkit hi ho $ link bo
26
27    kitsRec :: C.RelkitTable c
28    kitsRec = linkKit `B.mapSndTo` kits
29
30    link :: O.Map (C.RelkitBody c)
31    link (B.Sourced src core) =
32        B.Sourced src $
33         case core of
34           C.RelkitAbFull      u f bs    -> C.RelkitAbFull      u f $ map link bs
35           C.RelkitOneToAbMany u f bs    -> C.RelkitOneToAbMany u f $ map link bs
36           C.RelkitOneToAbOne  u f bs    -> C.RelkitOneToAbOne  u f $ map link bs
37           C.RelkitAbSemi        f b     -> C.RelkitAbSemi        f $ link  b
38           C.RelkitAppend        b1 b2   -> C.RelkitAppend (link b1) (link b2)
39           C.RelkitNest        p nest b  -> C.RelkitNest     p nest $ link  b
40           C.RelkitCopy        p copy b  -> C.RelkitCopy     p copy $ link  b
41           C.RelkitLink n key _ ->
42               case lookup key kitsRec of
43                 Just (C.Relkit _ _ b)   -> C.RelkitLink n key $ Just b
44                 Nothing                 -> core
45           _                             -> core
46
47-- todo: optimization
48relkitRun :: forall h. forall c. (Ord c, D.CRel c, D.SelectRel h)
49    => h c -> [C.Local [[c]]] -> C.RelkitBody c -> B.AbMap [[c]]
50relkitRun hook rs (B.Sourced toks core) bo1 =
51    Msg.abRun toks $
52     case core of
53       C.RelkitFull        u f     -> right u $ f             bo1
54       C.RelkitOneToMany   u f     -> right u $ f `concatMap` bo1
55       C.RelkitOneToOne    u f     -> right u $ f `map`       bo1
56       C.RelkitPred          f     -> Right   $ filter f      bo1
57
58       C.RelkitAbFull      u f bs  -> monad u $            f (mrun bs)        bo1
59       C.RelkitOneToAbOne  u f bs  -> monad u $            f (mrun bs) `mapM` bo1
60       C.RelkitOneToAbMany u f bs  -> right u . concat =<< f (mrun bs) `mapM` bo1
61       C.RelkitAbSemi        f b   -> B.filterM (semi f b) bo1
62       C.RelkitAbTest        f     -> B.filterM f bo1
63
64       C.RelkitConst           bo  -> Right bo
65       C.RelkitId                  -> Right bo1
66
67       C.RelkitAppend b1@(B.Sourced toks1 _) b2
68                                   -> do bo2 <- run b1 bo1
69                                         Msg.abRun toks1 $ run b2 bo2
70
71       C.RelkitSource pat ns       -> let r = D.selectRel hook pat ns
72                                      in Right $ D.relBody r
73
74       C.RelkitLink _ _ (Just b2)  -> run b2 bo1
75       C.RelkitLink n _ (Nothing)  -> Msg.unkRelmap n
76
77       C.RelkitNestVar p n         -> case C.a2lookup p n rs of
78                                        Just bo2  -> Right bo2
79                                        Nothing   -> Msg.unkNestRel p n $ C.localsLines rs
80       C.RelkitNest p nest b       -> do bo2 <- nestRel p nest b `mapM` bo1
81                                         right True $ concat bo2
82       C.RelkitCopy p n b          -> do bo2 <- relkitRun hook ((p, [(n, bo1)]) : rs) b bo1
83                                         right True $ bo2
84    where
85      run    = relkitRun hook rs
86      mrun   = map run
87
88      semi :: ([[c]] -> B.Ab Bool) -> C.RelkitBody c -> [c] -> B.Ab Bool
89      semi f b cs = f =<< run b [cs]
90
91      right :: (Ord b) => Bool -> [b] -> B.Ab [b]
92      right u = Right . uif u
93
94      monad :: (Ord b) => Bool -> B.Ab [b] -> B.Ab [b]
95      monad u = (Right . uif u =<<)
96
97      uif :: (Ord b) => Bool -> [b] -> [b]
98      uif True   = B.unique
99      uif False  = id
100
101      nestRel :: S.Token -> [(String, Int)] -> C.RelkitBody c -> [c] -> B.Ab [[c]]
102      nestRel p nest b cs =
103          let cs2 = pickup cs `map` nest
104          in relkitRun hook ((p, cs2) : rs) b [cs]
105
106      pickup :: [c] -> (String, Int) -> B.Named [[c]]
107      pickup cs (name, ind) = (name, D.relBody $ D.gRel $ cs !! ind)
108
109fixedRelation :: (Ord c) => O.Map (B.AbMap [[c]])
110fixedRelation f = fix where
111    fix bo1 = do bo2 <- f bo1
112                 if bo1 == bo2 then Right bo2 else fix bo2
113
114bmapAlign :: D.Head -> D.Head -> O.Map (B.AbMap [[c]])
115bmapAlign he1 he2 f = g where
116    g bo1 = do bo2 <- f bo1
117               Right $ D.bodyAlign he1 he2 bo2
118
